abilities.name: Suppress
abilities.description: When cast on an enemy, greatly slows the target enemy's movement speed, which decays over the duration. When cast on an ally or self, dispels the target, grants them slow resistance, and greatly increases their movement speed, which decays over the duration.
notes: The wielder always gets the allied buff, no matter whom Suppress is cast on
Can be cast on and fully affect invulnerable units
The slow decays evenly over the duration in 1-second intervals (100%/80%/60%/40%/20% at second 5/4/3/2/1/0)
The movement speed bonus decays evenly over the duration in 1-second intervals (100%/80%/60%/40%/20% at second 5/4/3/2/1/0)

abilities.name: Manabreak
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks burn their target's mana and deal damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt.
notes: Does not stack with Diffusal Blade-based abilities
Stacks additively with other sources of Mana Break
Attacks of illusions burn less mana (8 per hit)
Mana Break is a conditional attack damage bonus
Does not interact with percentage-based bonus attack damage, lifesteal, critical strike, cleave, or damage block
Does nothing if the attack target has no mana
Does not work against allied units

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 120 mana, 0.5 mana regeneration and 1% flat base magic resistance
40 and 10 main attack damage to agility/intelligence heroes respectively
22.5 main attack damage to universal heroes
